thread.title: NaVorro Bowman not in top form, but still leading 49ers’ defense
thread.title_full: NaVorro Bowman not in top form, but still leading 49ers’ defense - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ann Killion
title: NaVorro Bowman not in top form, but still leading 49ers’ defense
text:
Photo: Jeff Haynes, Associated Press NaVorro Bowman is still not 100 percent recovered from his injury, but he has been a mainstay of an evolving 49ers defense. NaVorro Bowman is still not 100 percent recovered from his injury,...
NaVorro Bowman is the 49ers’ only superstar left on defense, the only one remaining who took the field against the Ravens in Super Bowl XLVII. NaVorro Bowman is still not 100 percent recovered from his injury, but he has been a mainstay of an evolving 49ers defense. NaVorro Bowman is still not 100 percent recovered from his injury,...
NaVorro Bowman is the 49ers’ only superstar left on defense, the only one remaining who took the field against the Ravens in Super Bowl XLVII.
